full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SNYIGS DUS SEMS CAN GYI DBUL 'PHONGS SDUG BSNGAL SEL PHYIR SA BRGYAD DBANG PHYUG RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI AIL GOG SANG MER KEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI 'OD ZER RO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: AEL GOG SANG MER KEN PAndI TA,
